name: service_at_location
description: A link between a service and a specific location.

id.name: id
id.title: Identifier
id.description: The identifier of the service at location entry. Each entry must have a unique identifier.

service_id.name: service_id
service_id.title: Service Identifier
service_id.description: The identifier of the service at a given location.

location_id.name: location_id
location_id.title: Location Identifier
location_id.description: The identifier of the location where this service operates.

description.name: description
description.title: Description
description.description: A free text description of the service at this specific location.
description.example: Counselling Services provided by trained professionals in the MyCity area.

location.name: location
location.description: The details of the locations where organizations operate. Locations may be virtual, and one organization may have many locations.

id.name: id
id.title: Identifier
id.description: The identifier of the location. Each location must have a unique identifier.

location_type.name: location_type
location_type.title: Location Type
location_type.description: The type of location, which may be either `physical`, `postal`, or `virtual`.

url.name: url
url.title: URL
url.description: If location_type is virtual, then this field represents the URL of a virtual location.

organization_id.name: organization_id
organization_id.title: Organization Identifier
organization_id.description: The organization identifier for a location. This is the organization that is responsible for maintaining information about this location. The identifier of the organization should be given here. Details of the services the organization delivers at this location should be provided in the services_at_location table.

alternate_name.name: alternate_name
alternate_name.title: Alternate Name
alternate_name.description: An (optional) alternative name of the location.

description.name: description
description.title: Description
description.description: A free text description of the location.
description.example: MyCity Civic Center is located on Main Street and contains facilities for a number of civic and community services available.

transportation.name: transportation
transportation.title: Transportation
transportation.description: A free text description of the access to public or private transportation to and from the location.
transportation.example: MyCity Civic Center is serviced by the number 1 Bus and is a short walk from the Main Street Metro Station

latitude.name: latitude
latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: The latitude of the location expressed in decimal degrees in WGS84 datum.

longitude.name: longitude
longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: The longitude of the location expressed in decimal degrees in WGS84 datum.

external_identifier.name: external_identifier
external_identifier.title: External Identifier
external_identifier.description: A third party identifier for the location, which can be drawn from other services e.g. UK UPRN.

external_identifier_type.name: external_identifier_type
external_identifier_type.title: External Identifier Type
external_identifier_type.description: The scheme used for the location's external_identifier e.g. UK UPRN.

location.title: Location

service.name: service
service.description: The details of the services provided by organizations to a range of different groups.

id.name: id
id.title: Identifier
id.description: The identifier for the service. Each service must have a unique identifier.

organization_id.name: organization_id
organization_id.title: Organization Identifier
organization_id.description: The identifier of the organization that provides this service.

program_id.name: program_id
program_id.title: Program Identifier
program_id.description: The identifier of the program this service is delivered under.

name.name: name
name.title: Name
name.description: The official or public name of the service.

alternate_name.name: alternate_name
alternate_name.title: Alternate Name
alternate_name.description: An (optional) alternative name for this service.

description.name: description
description.title: Description
description.description: A free text description of the service.
description.example: Counselling Services provided by trained professionals. Suitable for people with mental health conditions such as anxiety, depression, or eating disorders as well as people experiencing difficult life events and circumstances.

email.name: email
email.title: Email
email.description: An email address which can be used to contact the service provider.

status.name: status
status.title: Status
status.description: The current status of the service which can be active, inactive, defunct, or temporarily closed.

interpretation_services.name: interpretation_services
interpretation_services.title: Interpretation Services
interpretation_services.description: A free text description of any interpretation services available for accessing this service.
interpretation_services.example: Interpretation services are available in Urdu, Polish, and Slovak

application_process.name: application_process
application_process.title: Application Process
application_process.description: A free text description of the steps needed to access this service.
application_process.example: If you are an NHS patient please ask your GP for a referral letter, we will then be in touch with you directly. If you are not an NHS patient you should ring our reception to arrange an appointment

fees_description.name: fees_description
fees_description.title: Fees Description
fees_description.description: A free text description of any charges for service users to access this service.
fees_description.example: Non-NHS patients are expected to pay for their counselling sessions. We charge a flat rate per hour of counselling. The current rate is £50 per hour. Please see our website for up to date prices.

wait_time.name: wait_time
wait_time.title: Wait Time
wait_time.description: DEPRECATED: The time a client may expect to wait before receiving a service.

fees.name: fees
fees.title: Fees
fees.description: DEPRECATED: Details of any charges for service users to access this service.

accreditations.name: accreditations
accreditations.title: Accreditations
accreditations.description: A free text description of any accreditations. Accreditation is the formal evaluation of an organization or program against best practice standards set by an accrediting organization.
accreditations.example: All of our practitioners are accredited by the BASC, UKCP, and the Professional Standards Body

eligibility_description.name: eligibility_description
eligibility_description.title: Eligibility Description
eligibility_description.description: A free text description of the type of person for whom this service is intended.
eligibility_description.example: This service is intended for all people aged 12 and over who require counselling services in the MyCity area

minimum_age.name: minimum_age
minimum_age.title: Minimum Age
minimum_age.description: The minimum age of a person required to meet this eligibility requirement.

maximum_age.name: maximum_age
maximum_age.title: Maximum Age
maximum_age.description: The maximum age of a person required to meet this eligibility requirement.

assured_date.name: assured_date
assured_date.title: Assured Date
assured_date.description: The date that the information about the service was last checked.

assurer_email.name: assurer_email
assurer_email.title: Assurer Email
assurer_email.description: The contact e-mail address for the person or organization which last assured the service.

licenses.name: licenses
licenses.title: Licenses
licenses.description: DEPRECATED: An organization may have a license issued by a government entity to operate legally. A list of any such licenses can be provided here.

alert.name: alert
alert.title: Alert
alert.description: A description of any short term alerts concerning the service.
alert.example: Following COVID-19 we have moved most of our counselling sessions online. Please contact the reception if you require further information.

last_modified.name: last_modified
last_modified.title: Last Modified
last_modified.description: The datetime when the service, or any related information about the service, has changed. Should have millisecond accuracy.

organization.name: organization
organization.description: The details about each organization delivering services. Each service should be linked to the organization responsible for its delivery. One organization may deliver many services.

id.name: id
id.title: Identifier
id.description: The identifier for the organization. Each organization must have a unique identifier.

name.name: name
name.title: Name
name.description: The official or public name of the organization.

alternate_name.name: alternate_name
alternate_name.title: Alternate Name
alternate_name.description: An (optional) alternative or commonly used name for the organization.

description.name: description
description.title: Description
description.description: A free text description containing a brief summary about the organization. It can contain markup such as HTML or Markdown.
description.example: Example Org is a non-profit organization dedicated to providing services to qualified beneficiaries

email.name: email
email.title: Email
email.description: The contact e-mail address for the organization.

website.name: website
website.title: Website
website.description: The URL (website address) of the organization.

tax_status.name: tax_status
tax_status.title: Tax Status
tax_status.description: DEPRECATED: Government assigned tax designation for tax-exempt organizations.

tax_id.name: tax_id
tax_id.title: Tax Identifier
tax_id.description: DEPRECATED: A government issued identifier used for the purpose of tax administration.

year_incorporated.name: year_incorporated
year_incorporated.title: Year Incorporated
year_incorporated.description: The year in which the organization was legally formed.

legal_status.name: legal_status
legal_status.title: Legal Status
legal_status.description: The legal conditions that an organization is operating under.

logo.name: logo
logo.title: Logo
logo.description: A URL to an image associated with the organization which can be presented alongside its name.

uri.name: uri
uri.title: URI
uri.description: A persistent identifier to uniquely identify the organization such as those provided by Open Corporates or some other relevant URI provider. This is not for listing the website of the organization: that can be done through the website field of the Organization.

parent_organization_id.name: parent_organization_id
parent_organization_id.title: Parent Organization Identifier
parent_organization_id.description: The identifier of the organization's parent organization.

organization.title: Organization

program.name: program
program.description: The details of collections of related services.

id.name: id
id.title: Identifier
id.description: The identifier for the program. Each program must have a unique identifier.

organization_id.name: organization_id
organization_id.title: Organization Identifier
organization_id.description: The identifier for the organization which the program belongs to. Each program must belong to a single organization, and the identifier for that organization should be given here.

alternate_name.name: alternate_name
alternate_name.title: Alternate Name
alternate_name.description: The (optional) alternative name for the program.

description.name: description
description.title: Description
description.description: A free text description of the program
description.example: Comprehensive Mental Health Services available to residents of MyCity including CBT and Counselling. This is not an emergency service and should not be used as an alternative to hospital and GP services.

program.title: Program
